reviewText:
Sylvo Montalbano solves crimes that appear simple at first glance. Set in beautiful Sicily, Sylvo solves crimes involving all levels of society, despite the opposition from mafia, church and bureacracy.
All this, while at the same time trying to fix his troubled love life, resist beautiful mediterranean female admirers and enjoying the culinary delights of cucina Siciliana.
Tension, European realism, comedy and drama without the Hollywood glitz, white teeth, hair and instant forensics.
